alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:35PM EST until November 29 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Northern Erie county. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 11 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the snowfall will occur during the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
